nodes.bodyText: Is this the right if statement? Seems like this should be further down @ line 21

Since enableResearchReviewPrompt is false there is no point even to have the api call this.workspaceService.getWorkspace to check for accessLevel or anything and just return
Observable.from([true])

I see - I didn't realize this was a new guard added only for this new review prompt feature. Lets discuss more, I have performance concerns with this approach and I think there may be some inconsistent behavior, but it's all feature flagged with this PR so it's not urgent.
